backend/main.mo: Defines the main backend actor with data models, maps for user data, attendance, expenses, notes, and reminders, plus authorization and approval logic.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old attendance entries to the new format by adding an empty note field while preserving other state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short descriptive summaries of many frontend components and utilities for reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with custom color variables, dark mode settings, and base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with title and favicon configuration.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component setting up providers, navigation tabs, layout, and approval-gated content.
frontend/src/components/attendance/Atten: Editor component for creating or updating a single day's attendance, including status, times, notes, validation, and save handling.
Monthly attendance calendar that displays days, holidays, and existing entries with navigation and date selection.
UI section to export attendance summaries as PDF for week, month, or year ranges with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/attendance/Holid: Admin-only interface to view, add, and delete holidays for the selected month with dialog-based creation.
frontend/src/components/auth/ApprovalGat: Gate component that checks approval and admin status to control access, offering request flow for unapproved users.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with status handling and query cache reset on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/UserProfile: Displays a modal for first‑time users to enter and save their name, handling validation and save errors.
frontend/src/components/deskboard/ClockC: Renders a live-updating digital clock and a monthly calendar grid with the current day highlighted.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: Implements an error boundary that catches runtime errors and shows a recovery UI with reset and reload options.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Shows the app header with login, navigation, attendance access, and Excel upload/replace controls.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main app layout with header, footer, content area, and in-app reminder notifications.
frontend/src/components/layout/DesktopSi: Displays a sidebar with navigation buttons for main, activity, and admin tabs, using tooltips and active state styling.
frontend/src/components/reminders/InAppR: Listens for reminder notifications and displays a dismissible toast with sound and animated character.
frontend/src/components/reminders/TechHe: Shows an animated character image with fallback to a static image on load failure.
frontend/src/components/results/ResultRo: Modal for editing a row's cell values and saving updated data.
frontend/src/components/search/ExploreHe: Panel showing Google search results in an iframe with fallback and open-in-tab option.
frontend/src/components/table/DataPrevie: Scrollable preview table displaying sheet headers and rows with empty‑cell handling.
frontend/src/components/table/Horizontal: Wrapper enabling horizontal scrolling for wide tables.
frontend/src/components/updateChecking/U: Search bar to filter update‑checking results by keyword and match type.
frontend/src/components/vlookup/VlookupA: Generates and displays step‑by‑step animated VLOOKUP logic based on provided sheet data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to identity changes and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useApproval.ts: Queries approval status, admin status, and approval list using the backend actor.
Mutations for requesting user approval and setting approval status with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAttendance.ts: Attendance hooks for fetching config, saving settings, and performing check‑in/out operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useAttendanceCalendar: Fetches all attendance entries and maps them into CalendarEvent objects for display.
frontend/src/hooks/useCalendarEvents.ts: Provides queries and mutations for calendar events, currently returning empty data since backend support is unavailable.
frontend/src/hooks/useHolidays.ts: Implements queries and mutations to fetch, create, update, and delete holiday entries with admin checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInAppReminderNotif: Checks reminders every second and triggers callback notifications when reminders become due, with cleanup logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity loading via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductivityMutati: Defines mutations for reminders, to-do items, and notes, while calendar event mutations throw errors due to unsupported backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductivityQuerie: Fetches and maps reminders, to-do items, notes, and returns empty calendar events based on backend data.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for listing, filtering, adding, and clearing history via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRegularExpense.ts: Implements queries and mutations for budgets and expenses, including validation and history logging.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Defines hooks to fetch and update the caller's user profile with actor readiness checks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables, dark mode, and macOS-inspired UI classes.
frontend/src/lib/attendance/attendancePd: Maps attendance summaries into structured PDF export data and provides filename generation.
frontend/src/lib/attendance/dateRanges.t: Utility functions for date range calculations and formatting durations and timestamps.
frontend/src/lib/compare/compareWorkbook: Compares two workbook sheets by key or content to detect new, updated, or unchanged rows.
frontend/src/lib/compare/filterCompariso: Filters comparison rows by keyword with exact or partial matching across all searchable fields.
frontend/src/lib/compare/normalizeRowSig: Creates deterministic row signatures and aligns old rows to new header orders by normalizing and mapping headers.
frontend/src/lib/excel/normalizeHeader.t: Provides utilities to normalize, sanitize, and search Excel headers with consistent trimming and deduplication.
frontend/src/lib/excel/parseWorkbook.ts: Loads SheetJS dynamically and parses an uploaded Excel file into sanitized sheet data with robust loading and validation.
Generates filtered, sorted expense report data with totals and filenames based on weekly, monthly, or yearly ranges.
frontend/src/lib/export/branding.ts: Defines branding config and loads logo and watermark assets as base64 or Image elements for exports.
frontend/src/lib/export/exportPdf.ts: Dynamically loads jsPDF and generates branded landscape PDFs with headers, footers, and an optional centered watermark.
frontend/src/lib/export/exportXlsx.ts: Exports data to XLSX with branding by dynamically loading SheetJS and generating a workbook with title and rows.
frontend/src/lib/export/pdfCompanyInfo.t: Provides static company contact and footer information for PDF branding.
frontend/src/lib/notes/noteEncoding.ts: Encodes and decodes note title and content into a single backend text field using a separator.
frontend/src/lib/results/applyRowEdits.t: Applies edited row values onto a base dataset using original row index mapping.
frontend/src/lib/results/exportFilters.t: Offers simple column-based filtering utilities to list unique values and filter exported rows.
frontend/src/lib/results/historyExport.t: Exports history entries to Excel and PDF by mapping entry types to labels and formatting rows.
frontend/src/lib/vlookup/vlookup.ts: Implements exact and approximate VLOOKUP supporting multiple return columns with validation and row metadata.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root and wraps the app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminUsersTab.tsx: Admin UI for viewing, approving, and rejecting user access requests with status badges and mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/AttendanceTab.tsx: Manages attendance tracking, configuration, summaries, calendar selection, and check‑in/out workflows using many hooks and UI states.
frontend/src/pages/CalendarTab.tsx: Displays and manages user and attendance calendar events, including creating and deleting events behind an approval gate.
frontend/src/pages/DeskboardTab.tsx: Dashboard combining search, reminders, events, todos, and notes with quick‑add dialogs and productivity data hooks.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryTab.tsx: Displays user history with filtering, grouping, exporting, and clear-history actions using hooks and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/NotesTab.tsx: Manages user notes with create and delete dialogs, error handling, and sorted display for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/RegularExpenseTab.tsx: Handles budgeting and regular expense management, including CRUD operations, validation, and PDF report exporting.
frontend/src/pages/RemindersTab.tsx: Manages general reminders with create/delete functionality, validation, and dialog-based input for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsTab.tsx: Displays computed results with row editing, filtering, and export to Excel/PDF, tracking edits and history entries.
frontend/src/pages/SearchTab.tsx: UI and logic for VLOOKUP and column-based filtering against the loaded workbook, including history logging and state updates.
frontend/src/pages/TodoTab.tsx: Renders and manages a user-authenticated to-do list with creation, toggling, error handling, and dialog UI.
frontend/src/pages/UpdateCheckingTab.tsx: Allows uploading a new Excel file and comparing it against the current workbook using a key column, then logs and displays comparison results.
frontend/src/pages/UploadTab.tsx: Handles Excel file upload, parsing, sheet selection, state replacement, and error reporting while recording upload history.
frontend/src/state/appState.tsx: Defines global app state for workbook data, search/filter/comparison results, upload status, and history with helpers for updating and normalizing state.
frontend/src/utils/attendance/configMapp: Utility functions for converting, validating, and constructing attendance configuration values from form inputs.
frontend/src/utils/errors/userFriendlyEr: Maps raw errors to user-friendly messages while logging full details for debugging.
frontend/src/utils/number/parseNatBigInt: Provides functions to validate and parse numeric strings into non-negative bigint values, returning structured success or error results.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, layout, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON file describing the project’s feature set, state, and active feature requests for an attendance and user management system.
